name: Cogeco Peer 1
tagline: Information Technology and Services Agency Toronto
description:
Technology takes people, too. Data. Networking. Servers. Cogeco Peer 1 helps keep small start-ups to Fortune 100 companies from around the world connected and up and running, 24/7. We’re technicians. Experts. Innovators. Always on. Always there. Our goal: help make our customers unstoppable. IT infrastructure providers is the depth of our expertise, the quality of our support, and the lengths we’ll go to make sure our service-focused attention meets or exceeds your business goals.
The capacity of our servers, data centers and network infrastructure is impressive, but what truly sets us apart in the marketplace is our experienced team, because technology takes dedicated people, too.
READ MORE...
